7 class TestPanda(unittest.TestCase):
8  def test_param_loaded(self):
9  dynamic_frequency = rospy.get_param('dynamic_frequency')
10  self.assertGreater(dynamic_frequency, 0)
11 
12  gravity_constant = rospy.get_param('gravity_constant')
13  self.assertEqual(gravity_constant, 9.81)
14 
15  oscillation_magnitude = rospy.get_param('oscillation_magnitude')
16  oscillation_frequency = rospy.get_param('oscillation_frequency')
17  self.assertTrue(isinstance(oscillation_magnitude, list))
18  self.assertTrue(isinstance(oscillation_frequency, list))
19  self.assertTrue(len(oscillation_magnitude) == len(oscillation_frequency))
20 
21  oscillation_time = rospy.get_param('oscillation_time')
22  self.assertGreater(oscillation_time, 0)
23 
24  is_sim = rospy.get_param('is_sim')
25  self.assertFalse(is_sim)
26 
27  rest_time = rospy.get_param('rest_time')
28  self.assertGreater(rest_time, 0)

34  self.assertTrue(key in panda_joint_position_controller.keys())
